title: Workshop on Mixed-Methods Research for Enhancing Online Learning Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Online learning experience and understanding of foundational research methodologies
context.additional_context: While most learners have online learning experience in social sciences, they are unfamiliar with systematic research methodologies. Project-based assessment focuses on real-case analysis and improvement strategies

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three or more critical success factors (CSFs) occurring in online learning environments
Learners can establish a research design evaluating online learning experiences using mixed research methods (surveys and focus groups)
Learners can propose two or more actionable strategies for improving online learning experiences based on evaluation results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
